message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. I believe this price is fair, considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,000,000 is still a bit low for me.  How about we split the difference and I offer you the product for $1,100,000? I believe this is a fair price that reflects both our needs.

I understand your position, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1,050,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, but I think this is the highest I can go.
